The FinnishTeam.

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - (Apr 17 2012)
* '''Team Contact''' - Jussi Kekkonen <tmt@ubuntu.com>
* '''Membership''' - 11 Ubuntu members in Finland, ~30 on teams IRC channel, 30 active members in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-fi|l10n team]]</nowiki>, 13k+ forum members, ~1220 Facebook fans
* '''Mailing List''' - ubuntu-fi on lists.ubuntu.com + <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Postituslistat_ja_IRC|a couple team-specific]]</nowiki>
* '''IRC''' - #ubuntu-fi / #ubuntu-fi-tiimit on freenode
* '''Website''' - http://www.ubuntu-fi.org/ ~-[``<nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-fi/+junk/www-sivut|bzr dev]]</nowiki>``]-~
* '''Blog''' - http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/
* '''Wiki''' - http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/TitleIndex (parts of website, some guides although http://linux.fi/ is recommended for distro-neutral guides)
* '''Forums''' - http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/ (ca. 310k messages)
* '''LoCo site  http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-fi
* '''Facebook''' - http://www.facebook.com/ubuntusuomi
* '''Twitter''' - http://twitter.com/ubuntusuomi
* '''Google+''' - https://plus.google.com/103462909421745622548/
* '''identi.ca''' - http://identi.ca/group/ubuntufi

=== Roadmap ===

* Renew http://www.ubuntu-fi.org - WIP site at http://ubuntufi.dev.zeip.eu/
* Distribute 12.04 LTS CDs to libraries and universities around the country
* 12.04 release party in Tampere, also installfest in Espoo and small event in Joensuu
* Continue now-traditional Linux stand and helpdesk in Assembly

=== Experience & events ===

Some highlights from our activities. 

* ''100% l10n coverage of 12.04 LTS help pages'' <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu-docs/precise/+pots/ubuntu-help/fi/|LP link]]</nowiki>
* ''97% l10n coverage of <nowiki>[[http://91.189.93.77/stats/precise|Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Translations]]</nowiki>''
* ''We wrote a wikibook '<nowiki>[[http://fi.wikibooks.org/wiki/Ubuntu_tutuksi|Ubuntu tutuksi]]</nowiki>' (Get to know Ubuntu) to make it easy for beginners to start with Ubuntu''
* ''Close co-operation with COSS, the Finnish Center for Open Source Solutions, for example our Team Contact is one of the referees in <nowiki>[[http://www.coss.fi/ubuntu-challenge|'Ubuntu Challenge']]</nowiki> programming competition''
* ''Supporting schools in LTSP clusters by organizing LTPS workshops: <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/LTSP5_Ty%C3%B6paja_2009|2009]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/LTSP5_Ty%C3%B6paja_2009_2|2009_2]]</nowiki>''
* ''Linux stand and helpdesk in Assembly''. Blog posts: <nowiki>[[http://is.gd/TXQdV2|2011]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://is.gd/56gGx7|2010]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2009/tunnelmia-assemblyjen-linux-standilta/|2009]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2008/tunnelmia-assemblyjen-linux-pisteelta/|2008]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2007/assemblyjen-linux-tukipalvelu/|2007]]</nowiki>. Forum threads: <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/index.php?topic=25919.0|2009]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/index.php?topic=17462.0|2008]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/index.php?topic=12120.msg87251#msg87251|2007]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://is.gd/TXQdV2|2011]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://is.gd/56gGx7|2010]]</nowiki>
* ''Mailed Ubuntu CDs with a letter to members of Finnish parliament in 2007''. <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2007/lehdistotiedote-ubuntu-suomi-toimitti-ubuntun-kansanedustajille/|Press release in blog]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Press_release-Ubuntu_CDs_for_Finnish_parliament_representatives|press release in English]]</nowiki>.
* ''Release parties of variable sizes.'' - LTS-releases with proper spaces and up to hundreds of visitors, smaller releases celebrated with cafe meetings. <nowiki>[[https://picasaweb.google.com/110850097645388144646/Ubuntu1004LTSReleaseFest|10.04 LTS]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2008/uutta-ubuntua-juhlistettiin-julkaisutapahtumissa/|8.04 LTS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-fi.org/2007/pari-kuvaa-feistyn-julkaisutapahtumasta/|7.04]]</nowiki>
* ''Close co-operation with <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Paikallistoiminta|LUGs]]</nowiki> around the country, as well as <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.fi|linux.fi wiki]]</nowiki>''
* ''Ubuntu Finland itself was awarded the "Linux-tekijä 2008" main award in 2008 <nowiki>[[http://www.flug.fi/tiedotteet/2008/tiedote-linuxtekija2008.pdf|press release]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuWeeklyNewsletter/Issue90|UWN Issue 90]]</nowiki>. The prize money has been used to print Ubuntu CDs and promotional material for release parties and other events.'' The award was <nowiki>[[http://www.tietokone.fi/uutiset/2008/ubuntu_sai_kukkia_ministerilta|handed over by the Finnish Minister of Communications]]</nowiki>.
* ''Started LinuCast, a <nowiki>[[http://podcastit.tv/?q=blog/6|Linux-podcast]]</nowiki> in 2007, which was honored with the "Linux-tekijä 2009" title'' - Spinned off in 2009, currently the only Linux-podcast in Finland.''
* ''Designing and ordering <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/index.php?topic=20763.0|Ubuntu T-shirts]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fi.org/index.php?topic=28667.msg220203#msg220203|photo]]</nowiki>''
* ''Constantly distributing Ubuntu CDs to libraries around the country <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Lainaa_Ubuntu|List of libraries where one can find Ubuntu CD]]</nowiki>''
* ''We have created <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Ubuntu_Finnish_Remix|Ubuntu Finnish Remix]]</nowiki> that has full Finnish language support without Internet connection''
* ''Mirv / Jyrinki, our past team contact, has done work for all language groups in general by reporting and/or fixing I18N problems''
* ''From 2009 on, we've been running <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Yhteis%C3%B6n_kokous|bi-weekly online community meetings]]</nowiki>''
* ''Promotional materials <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Ubuntu_julisteet|Posters]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/CD-levygrafiikat|CD graphics]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-fi.org/Materiaaleja|others]]</nowiki>''
